abstract: Toyota Motor said it had returned to a profit in the latest quarter as aggressive cost cuts, government incentives and signs of a global recovery buoyed its bottom line.
snippet: Toyota Motor said it had returned to a profit in the latest quarter as aggressive cost cuts, government incentives and signs of a global recovery buoyed its bottom line.
lead_paragraph: TOKYO  Toyota Motor said on Thursday that it had returned to a profit in the latest quarter as aggressive cost cuts, government incentives and signs of a global economic recovery all buoyed its bottom line.

headline.main: Cost Cuts and Incentive Program Help Toyota End a String of Losses
headline.print_headline: Cost Cuts and Incentive Program Help Toyota End a String of Losses
